modName: Robe Replacer for The Art of Magicka
summary: Replaces the default college robes with The Art of Magicka's robes.
descriptionHtml:
I've been waiting and waiting for the creator of The Art of Magicka to create a replacer version of the mod but it never came so I took it upon myself to create one for the community to use.

This mod is still in its infancy and currently only replaces the college robes and the magicka regeneration robes. It also doesn't have support for separate hoods and instead has built-in hoods that add the novice, apprentice, and adept hood effects to the corresponding robes(Ex. novice robes: +30mp, apprentice robes: +40mp, adept, expert, and master robes: +50mp). This is because I ran into a problem figuring out how to get the novice, apprentice, and adept hoods to match the color of each type of robe.

My modding experience is limited so any advice or suggestions are welcome. Feel free to develop and evolve this mod as you please.

REQUIREMENTS:
The Art of Magicka by Zonzai, Kalell, and UKC (available on the Nexus)

INSTALLATION:
Copy "AOM Replacer V*.esp" to your data files directory or install via the Nexus Mod Manager

[size=3]ALL CREDIT FOR MODELS AND TEXTURES GOES TO THE CREATORS OF "THE ART OF MAGICKA": ZONZAI, KALELL, AND UKC.[/size]
author: Kafel
